text: A Unique Spring () is a 1957 Soviet drama movie directed by Aleksandr Stolper.Художник-постановщик "Мосфильма" Стален Волков умер в возрасте 93 летНЕПОВТОРИМАЯ ВЕСНА It stars Yevgeniya Kozyreva, Izolda Izvitskaya, and Aleksandr Mikhaylov. ==Actors== * Yevgeniya Kozyreva as Elena * Izolda Izvitskaya as Anna Burova * Aleksandr Mikhaylov as Yevgeny Burov * Ivan Dmitriev as Aleksandr Novozhilov * Irina Skobtseva as Claudia Novozhilova * Svetlana Kharitonova as Masha == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1957 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Stolper
title: A Unique Spring
